task.title: Resetting emergency shutdown flags
task.shortdesc: After resolving the issue that caused an emergency shutdown, use this procedure to service status, and then restart the service.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Check services for the emergency shutdown flag:

info.codeblock: for s in $(serviced service list --show-fields ServiceID | grep -v ServiceID); \ do serviced service list $s | grep EmergencyShutdown\"; done

step.cmd: Clear the emergency-shutdown flag for a service or the entire application:
Check services for the emergency shutdown flag:

info.codeblock: for s in $(serviced service list --show-fields ServiceID); \ do serviced service list $s | grep EmergencyShutdown\"; done
info.p: "False" indicates that the flags have been cleared.
